page.title: 06Home Life
page.content: I live in a semi-detached{house}with my{parents}and baby sister. I like to help my mum with the cooking I like cooking pies and cakes while my mum cooks the dinners like chips and beefburger.My mum is a barmaid and my dad is in the mining industry.Me and my sister have two goldfish.We all like gardening because we have a big lawn ,three flower beds and some tall trees.We also have a lawn and a patio on the front. My{hobbies}are playing the recorder and horse riding. I also like reading. My mum does the housework which incldes washing ironing and tidying up.
